```{r}
trip_data <- read.csv("trips_per_day.csv") 
trip_data$trip_date <- as.Date(trip_data$trip_date)
trip_data$n_month <- as.numeric(format(trip_data$trip_date, "%m"))
trip_data$month <- factor(trip_data$n_month, levels = 1:12, labels = month.abb)
boxplot(n_trips ~ month, data = trip_data)

```
